NLP Utilities¶

nlp_utils.apply_fn_to_tokenized_phrase(phrase, function)[source]¶

Tokenizes a phrase and applies a transformation function to each word.

Parameters:
  • phrase (str) – The input phrase.
  • function (function) – The function used to transform each word.
Returns:

the transformed phrase.
Return type:

str
nlp_utils.provision_lemmatizer(lexical_db='wordnet')[source]¶

Provides a lemmatizer from the WordNet lexical database.

Parameters:lexical_db (str) – Lexical DB (currently only WordNet is supported).
Returns:WordNet lemmatizer.
Return type:nltk.stem.wordnet.WordNetLemmatizer
nlp_utils.provision_stemmer(stemmer='porter', debug=False)[source]¶

Provides the specified stemmer.

Returns:Stemmer.
Return type:nltk.stem.porter.PorterStemmer or nltk.stem.lancaster.LancasterStemmer
nlp_utils.provision_tokenizer()[source]¶

Provides the Punkt word tokenizer.

Returns:The Punk word tokenizer.
Return type:function
